original_text: In everything he followed the ways of his father Asa and did not stray from them; he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord. The high places, however, were not removed, and the people continued to offer sacrifices and burn incense there.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 그의 아버지 아사의 모든 길로 행하며 돌이키지 아니하고 여호와 앞에서 정직히 행하였으나 산당은 폐하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 아직도 산당에서 제사를 드리며 분향하였더라

sentences.original_text: In everything he followed the ways of his father Asa
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 일에 그의 아버지 아사의 길을 따랐으며

sentences.original_text: and did not stray from them
he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 정직한 행동을 했다

sentences.original_text: The high places, however, were not removed
and the people continued to offer sacrifices
